verbose_text: Exogenous BMP-2 is known to have potent anabolic actions on adult articular chondrocytes, increasing proteoglycan and collagen synthesis and maintaining the chondrocyte phenotype [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: BMP-2 is known to have potent anabolic actions on adult articular chondrocytes, increasing proteoglycan and collagen
